author: Prime Video
description:
A chilling two-part Amazon Original documentary that exposes the dark side of dating in one of North America's largest cities. When successful real estate broker Heather Rovet fell for charismatic handyman "Jace," she believed she'd found her soulmate. For three years, their relationship seemed perfect—until a shocking discovery revealed her lover was actually Jason Porter, a convicted criminal with a history of romantic deception. As Heather uncovers a disturbing pattern of manipulation and connects with other victims, she transforms from heartbroken victim to determined investigator, risking everything to bring Porter to justice. ROMCON: Who the F*** is Jason Porter premieres June 13.

» SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/PrimeVideoSubscribe
